posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
I've uploaded the Python 3 script that I use as a damage calculator to the Neverwinter Vault. There is both a vanilla version and a BSK-specific version of the script for people who want a tool that can help with min-maxing builds. The download includes a basic explanation of the script and examples of how to use it.

https://neverwintervault.org/project/nw ... r-adprcalc
